title: Motorola starts rolling out stable Android 12 to the Moto G100
content:
Last week, Motorola started rolling out the stable Android 12 update for the Motorola Edge (2021) and the Motorola Edge Plus. The company is now giving the Moto G100 the same treatment, and according to a recent post on our forums, the update has started rolling out to users in Brazil. The Android 12 update

The post Motorola starts rolling out stable Android 12 to the Moto G100 appeared first on XDA.
description: Motorola has started rolling out the stable Android 12 update for the Moto G100 in Brazil. Read on to learn more about the update.
